nitthāra：m．[Sk．nistāra．cf．nitthāreti] 濟度，贖罪，釋放，使自由．cf．netthāra．

Nitthāra，[Sk．nistāra； nis+tāra of tarati1] passing over，rescue，payment，acquittance，in °ṁ vattati to be acquitted，to get off scot-free M．I，442 （v．l．netth°，which is the usual form）．See netthāra．（Page 357）
